amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE V--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 501: None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to limit outreach programs administered by the Smithsonian Institution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to curtail the limitation on funds for Smithsonian outreach programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
